Name: InfiniteBeat
About the game: INFINITE BEAT Get ready for an intense and dynamic ride in the new INFINITE BEAT! Experience a satisfying feeling of smashing Neon Beats, using glowing Laser Disks, which are fly back in your hands after shooting! In addition, you have to hit the incoming Neon Beats in the correct color,  you have to  survive as long as possible and gain as many points as possible.By using special abilities that you can gain while playing, such a Machine Gun , Chameleon , Freeze Time or Health , the game gets more dynamic and you can earn much more points. Do not let any Beat hit your shield. SPECIAL ABILITIES: MachineGun : Neon disks gain ultimate continuous shooting capability while holding trigger. Chameleon : Neon Beats and Laser Disks will momentarily turn their color to neutral blue. Then you can hit all Beats with both light discs, regardless of color. Freeze Time : After hitting the Beat with this symbol, time has slowed and you have more time to hit the incoming beats. Health : Beat with a health symbol starts to appear when the protective shield is damaged. By smashing Beat, part of your shield health is restored. Amusing game mechanics are accompanied by beautiful visual effects and nice music. Test your reflexes, train, overcome yourself and compare yourself with your friends! Are you ready ? The game is currently in a minimum viable product with the basic mechanics with special abilities and contains three songs, but is very fun.We plan to add new mods (exercises), new power ups, environments, reward system, music, and much more in the future to pleasure you.
